definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="world_entity_inrange"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.FLINT_AND_STEEL</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_nogravity"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="gravityValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_num_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesnumber">CUSTOM:InstantTNTTimer</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="explode"><field name="mode">BREAK</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="world_data_num_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesnumber">CUSTOM:InstantTNTStrength</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
